recipe.title: Cajun and Blackening Seasoning
instructions: Combine the paprika, onion, garlic, cayenne, white pepper, black pepper, thyme, oregano, New Mexican chile, and chipotle chile in a bowl. Store in a covered container for at least 6 months.
